head.title: Interchalet - Terms and Conditions
head.description: Here you will find the valid terms and conditions for your booking with Interchalet.

content.text:
Thank you for your interest in holiday homes with Interchalet!

According to the Travel Regulations implemented on 01 July 2018, your contract partner HHD AG with the brand Interchalet, hereinafter called Interchalet, is no longer subject to the Package Travel Regulations.
However, Interchalet resolved to continue being guided by the approved guidelines for the benefit of the traveller as well as the main points of the contract concluded between you and Interchalet to be subject to the new Package Travel Regulations.

Additionally, the following Terms & Conditions which elaborate on and supplement the statutory provisions shall apply.
Upon booking, all customers accept these Terms & Conditions as binding upon themselves and the persons for whom the booking is made.
Interchalet Terms and Conditions (PDF)
Valid from 24.03.2021

To read and print PDF files you need Adobe Acrobat Reader. If you have not installed it, you can download it here for free.

elements.title: Good quality guaranteed!
elements.caption:
Our team visits the properties in-person.
Regular quality checks.
Detailed, honest descriptions of the accommodation.
Guaranteed authentic customer reviews.
Best rental prices for our customers!

elements.title: Personally there for you!
elements.caption:
Competent & friendly staff in our in-house Service-Centre.
All questions regarding your accommodation and surrounding area, happily answered.
Only you can rate your accommodation after your holiday with us!

elements.title: 49 years of experience!
elements.caption:
You can count on us: More than 49 years of experience in the holiday home industry.
Approx. 40,000 holiday homes and apartments selected for you in Europe and Florida.

elements.title: Why Interchalet?
elements.caption:
A simple apartment or an exclusive villa with private pool. In the mountains and by the sea, in summer and winter. At Interchalet you will find the right accommodation for your dream holiday in a holiday home.
We currently have approx.Â 40.000 holiday houses and holiday apartments for your holidays!

elements.title: Spending time in a holiday home is the ideal solution for everyone!
elements.caption:
If you would like to enjoy a relaxing holiday as a couple or with family and friends, then you will love spending time in a holiday home or holiday apartment.
You can spend your holiday your way, in typical accommodation for your destination so you can quickly get familiar with the country and its people. An individual and unique holiday experience. Together we can find the ideal destination for your holiday based on your interests and preferences.
